descriptionHtml:
Requires:

1. Dawnguard
2. ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Description For Update 2.0:

This mod adds a vampire gir follower named Sybil to the Hall of the Dead in WhiteRun. She is the long lost cousin of Serana from the main quest of Dawnguard and her backstory is explained in detail in a book that can be found in the Hall of the Dead. Beyond that she is a follower that caps at level 80, knows several dragon shouts, and various other useful spells. Included also is a spell to summon her to your side from anywhere in Skyrim.

She has her own sword and a special bow that can be found in the Hall as well. This bow tends to make things a bit batty...

Enjoy and endorse please!


Permission notes:
Use it however you wish just credit me as the original creator and let me know so I can check it out :D

Credits:
Made by MercyXx (Steam ID: Blackjack_Pershing) can also be found in the steam workshop at:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=90712045
Hair pack by Apachii
author: MercyXx
